Metadata.Title: There Is a Formal Process for Testing Changes to the Firewall Configuration
Metadata.DirectLink: There Is a Formal Process for Testing Changes to the Firewall Configuration

Content.Data:
Applies to

  • PCI DSS Requirement 1.1.1

What to Check For

Ensure that the network documentation and the Information Security policy include a requirement for a formal process for testing changes to the firewall configuration. Verify that the network documentation includes directions for a procedure to test changes to the firewall configuration.

Why

Changes to the firewall configuration must be tested to make sure that vulnerabilities are not introduced inadvertently by the changes made to the firewall configuration.

How to Check

Examine the network documentation and the Information Security policy to make sure they include a requirement and a description of a process to test changes to the firewall configuration.

How to Fix

Add a point to the Information Security policy to require following a specific process to test changes to the firewall configuration whenever changes to the firewall configuration are being made. Describe a process for testing changes to the firewall configuration in the network documentation. Perform a test run of the testing process to make sure that the process is adequate for your network. For help with implementing a process to test changes to the firewall configuration, please refer to the guideline article "Test Changes to the Firewall Configuration," linked below.
